conversation.content:
id                       description                                                                         slot
--------------------------------  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ee8ecb02297d44d192fd2ecd29163c58  Grants permission to users who have been approved to access specific resources or features.  34e7a31d84bb4321912b71bf18139ffe, d54bb579020f4caa84d99058887aa042, 7bbc8b06f5254990a5448873f8b2921e
134dc4bc8c194ed28b43e990ad7757da  Prevents unauthorized users from accessing certain resources or features.                    b27bdf532d754bc78b2d42f52ccc0072, 64c6f19ff34040299accce22e66174ae, 8ec78ad599e9452e9529ecff24e4f0ab
e92826622b444f6b9da3662415c3acb1  Enables the user to modify their current password.                                           5e0f39fa786b498491414bf1b3c08b84, 5e0bcd87d1ce480ab48e3ebff2e9163e, 6dd29f71ea374438b3ff4c7e1ae530bd



id                         description                              examples
--------------------------------  ----------------------------------------------  ------------------------------------------------------------
34e7a31d84bb4321912b71bf18139ffe  The user to grant access to.
d54bb579020f4caa84d99058887aa042  The type of access to grant.                    read, write, admin
7bbc8b06f5254990a5448873f8b2921e  The resource to grant access to.
b27bdf532d754bc78b2d42f52ccc0072  The user whose access is being denied.
64c6f19ff34040299accce22e66174ae  The resource for which access is being denied.
8ec78ad599e9452e9529ecff24e4f0ab  The reason for denying access.                  Security risk, Policy violation, Unauthorized access attempt
5e0f39fa786b498491414bf1b3c08b84  The current password of the user.               *, password123, qwerty123, letmein, 123456
5e0bcd87d1ce480ab48e3ebff2e9163e  The new password that the user wants to set.
6dd29f71ea374438b3ff4c7e1ae530bd  The confirmation of the new password.
